name: Platnum
description:
'''Platnum''' are a British [[Bassline (music genre)|bassline]] vocal group from [[Manchester, England|Manchester]], England. The original line-up consisted of male vocalist Aaron Evers and female vocalists Mina Poli and Michelle McKenna. The trio are best known for providing the vocals on [[H "Two" O]]'s [[2008 in British music|2008]] single, "[[What's It Gonna Be (H "Two" O song)|What's It Gonna Be]]?", which reached number two in the [[UK Singles Chart]] in February 2008. Platnum, who formed around [[2004 in music (UK)|2004]], have worked with DJs Jamie Duggan and Q as well as producers Virgo, H "Two" O and Nastee Boi.

The group's highly anticipated second single, "[[Love Shy (song)#Platnum version|Love Shy (Thinking About You)]]" was released on 29 September 2008; they then started work on their debut album which became a mixtape and also toured, supporting [[N-Dubz]], in the UK in Autumn 2009.
